QuestData.Title: Beatface vs. Boulder
QuestData.Description: The saberon took their treasure up the rise and barricaded themselves in after Birchus attacked. It will be difficult to get in but I hear you have resources to handle this.$b$bOne of their entrances is covered with a large boulder. Too large for you or I, but perhaps an ogre with a large enough hammer could break it. I think you know who I am talking about...
QuestData.LogDescription: Break the boulder barrier using Beatface the gladiator.
QuestData.RewardText: You have strong friends $p. We must make haste before the plants realize the way is open.
